title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 205.3 - Pedestrians
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 205.3 - Pedestrians

State Regulations

Pedestrian access to authority bridges shall be limited to
those walkways posted for pedestrian access. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
205.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
